text: Hitobito yo, watashi wa kore (dendo) ni taishite, anata gata ni zaika o motomenai. Watashi wa, tada arra kara hosho o itadaku dakedearu. Mata watashi wa, shinko-sha-tachi o (anadotte) oikaesou to wa shinai. Hontoni kare-ra wa omoni au midearu. Mushiro anata gata wa, muchi no mindearu to watashi wa kangaeru
